plot: With Lee's help, Faye finally regains her solo magic but at a terrible price. Finding out where Cassie's father used to live stuns the circle.

When Cassie asks for Adam's help in looking into her father's past, the search leads them to an eerily familiar place. It also reignites an old spark, leading Adam, thrilled to be spending time with Cassie again, to ask her to the Fire and Ice dance; but, because of her friendship with Diana, Cassie gives a surprising response. Ethan, in an effort to be a better father, offers to chaperon the dance, much to Adam's dismay. Lee's help with a spell to grant Faye individual magic unfortunately produces a terrifying side effect that nearly destroys the Circle.—CW Publicity
